property.name: relationshipField
property.label: Relationship field
property.description: Api name of the relationship field in the child object referencing the parent

property.name: orderBy
property.label: Specifications about how to order the records displayed

property.name: recordsToLoad
property.label: Number of records to show
property.description: When used as a tree grid, this value is used to retrieve children records along with top level records, so if it is small, children records may not appear

property.name: nestingRelationshipField
property.label: Nesting relationship field
property.description: Specify if you want the data to be nested as a tree grid. If not included already in the fieldset, it will be added automatically. It will not work properly if the value is equals to Relationship field

property.name: maxDepth
property.label: Max depth
property.description: Only applies when Is Tree Grid is true. If not specified, then 10 is applied

property.name: height
property.label: Height
property.description: Value for the height CSS attribute (should be fixed if inifite loading is enabled)

property.name: showRowNumberColumn
property.label: Show row numbers in the first column?

property.name: hideCheckboxColumn
property.label: Hide checkbox column for row selection?

property.name: enableInfiniteLoading
property.label: Enable infinite loading on scrolling to retrieve more records?

property.name: hideDefaultColumnsActions
property.label: Hide default actions in column headers?
